subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: The team is leading India, 2-0, in a four-test series, and if it wins by a margin of two it will go to No. 1 in the world rankings for the first time since the 1970s.
snippet: The team is leading India, 2-0, in a four-test series, and if it wins by a margin of two it will go to No. 1 in the world rankings for the first time since the 1970s.
